name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slay School: AI flashcard maker & Quizlet alternative

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate flashcards, multiple choice questions, study guides and summaries from any page on the internet using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate flashcards, multiple choice questions, study guides and summaries from any page on the internet using AI

Instantly creates flashcards from any digital content, video, even UWorld questions! Designed for efficiency and effectiveness. it's the perfect study companion for students, with a special focus for those preparing for USMLE, NCLEX, MCAT, and future exams across disciplines.

Trusted by over 75,000 students around the world. Works on any chrome browser in any language. 

Key Features:

- Instant Flashcards: One click generates flashcards from the internet, streamlining study time and enhancing retention.
- Edit or Delete Flashcards: Edit or delete flashcards straight from within the chrome extension!
- Flexible Study Options: Export to Anki and Quizlet or study directly within the Slay School app.
- Video summaries: Instead of watching everything, get the key points faster
- Study smarter: Practice test questions from any source material

Get Started Quickly:

1. Install: Add Slay School to Chrome.
2. Create an account: Access your new study arsenal.
3. Open the chrome extension any UWorld question and watch flashcards be generated
4. To study or export your flashcards go to https://app.slayschool.com

Download Slay School and 10x your studying efficiency today!
